Articles.Content:
i\'m pretty new to KSP, only about 8 hours of play time and a few hours of forum lurking, so far i\'ve only managed a few stable orbits and some fairly unstable planes using C7\'s aviation pack but i\'m really looking forward to seeing how far i can take these little kerbals.

cheers

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

8 hours and you made it into orbit?

When I first got KSP it toke me two months. Only then Orbit map came out

(It\'s M to activate)
